text:
Introducing a "Multipurpose Amusement Facility"...
Is it really good like this, Kogane?

I feel like I'm only saying "wow" or "ahh"...
It's like I'm not really contributing~...

N-No, it's not just my imagination.
I've actually only been screaming...

I-Is that so~!?
I'll make sure to report properly next time...

Hehe, you don't have to feel pressured. Even from Kogane's
honest reactions, the charm of the facility comes through.

I-Is that so...
I thought I should introduce it more coolly, but...
Isn't it best for Kogane to be herself?

Yeah...
Just stay as you are.

If everyone says so... I understand!
Next time, I'll scream without hesitation~!!
